verbose_text: The increased renal mass may be attributed to hyperglycemia as proliferation and hypertrophy of mesangial cells and thickening of the glomerular basement membrane promote increased renal mass [XREF_BIBR] along with vasodilation, inflammation, and increased connective tissue [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: proliferation and hypertrophy of mesangial cells and thickening of the glomerular basement membrane promote increased renal mass [ XREF_BIBR ] along with vasodilation, inflammation
